title: SkullCandy: Offbeat
attribution: Art Direction & Design by Julia Endow, Meijun Cai and Sylvia Kim
description: SkullCandy is a brand that speaks to the rebels, the misfits, the creatives, the daydreamers, the troublemakers, the strange, and the unique. We used an analogy with animal metaphors to communicate our idea: The Lone Wolf, The Dark Horse, and The Black Sheep.
